00029 class QwtText::EngineDict
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     EngineDict();
00033     ~EngineDict();
00034 
00035     const QwtTextEngine *textEngine(const QString &, 
00036         QwtText::TextFormat) const;
00037 
00038 private:
00039     typedef QMap<int, QwtTextEngine *> EngineMap;
00040 
00041     inline const QwtTextEngine *engine(EngineMap::const_iterator &it) const 
00042     {
00043 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00044         return it.data();
00045 #else
00046         return it.value();
00047 #endif
00048     }
00049 
00050     EngineMap d_map;
00051 };
00052 
00053 QwtText::EngineDict::EngineDict()
00054 {
00055     d_map.insert(QwtText::PlainText, new QwtPlainTextEngine());
00056 #ifndef QT_NO_RICHTEXT
00057     d_map.insert(QwtText::RichText, new QwtRichTextEngine());
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00061 
00062     // Plugins are not implemented for Qt 3
00063 
00064     const QStringList libPaths = QApplication::libraryPaths();
00065     foreach (QString path, QApplication::libraryPaths())
00066     {
00067         QDir pluginsDir(path);
00068         if ( !pluginsDir.cd("textengines") )
00069             continue;
00070 
00071         foreach (QString fileName, pluginsDir.entryList(QDir::Files))
00072         {
00073             QPluginLoader loader(pluginsDir.absoluteFilePath(fileName));
00074 
00075             QwtTextPlugin *plugin = 
00076                 qobject_cast<QwtTextPlugin *>(loader.instance());
00077             if (plugin)
00078             {
00079                 EngineMap::iterator it = d_map.find(plugin->format());
00080                 if ( it == d_map.end() )
00081                     d_map.insert(plugin->format(), plugin->engine());
00082             }
00083         }
00084     }
00085 #endif // QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00086 }
00087 
00088 QwtText::EngineDict::~EngineDict()
00089 {
00090     for ( EngineMap::const_iterator it = d_map.begin(); 
00091         it != d_map.end(); ++it )
00092     {
00093         QwtTextEngine *textEngine = (QwtTextEngine *)engine(it);
00094         delete textEngine;
00095     }
00096 }
00097 
00098 const QwtTextEngine *QwtText::EngineDict::textEngine(const QString& text,
00099     QwtText::TextFormat format) const
00100 {
00101     if ( format == QwtText::AutoText )
00102     {
00103         for ( EngineMap::const_iterator it = d_map.begin(); 
00104             it != d_map.end(); ++it )
00105         {
00106             if ( it.key() != QwtText::PlainText )
00107             {
00108                 const QwtTextEngine *e = engine(it);
00109                 if ( e && e->mightRender(text) )
00110                     return (QwtTextEngine *)e;
00111             }
00112         }
00113     }
00114 
00115     EngineMap::const_iterator it = d_map.find(format);
00116     if ( it != d_map.end() )
00117     {
00118         const QwtTextEngine *e = engine(it);
00119         if ( e )
00120             return e;
00121     }
00122 
00123     it = d_map.find(QwtText::PlainText);
00124     return engine(it);
00125 }

00128 class QwtText::PrivateData
00129 {
00130 public:
00131     PrivateData():
00132         renderFlags(Qt::AlignCenter),
00133         backgroundPen(Qt::NoPen),
00134         backgroundBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
00135         paintAttributes(0),
00136         layoutAttributes(0),
00137         textEngine(NULL)
00138     {
00139     }
00140 
00141     int renderFlags;
00142     QString text;
00143     QFont font;
00144     QColor color;
00145     QPen backgroundPen;
00146     QBrush backgroundBrush;
00147 
00148     int paintAttributes;
00149     int layoutAttributes;
00150 
00151     const QwtTextEngine *textEngine;
00152 };

00154 class QwtText::LayoutCache
00155 {
00156 public:
00157     void invalidate()
00158     {
00159         textSize = QSize();
00160     }
00161 
00162     QFont font;
00163     QSize textSize;
00164 };

00172 QwtText::QwtText(const QString &text, QwtText::TextFormat textFormat)
00173 {
00174     d_data = new PrivateData;
00175     d_data->text = text;
00176     d_data->textEngine = textEngine(text, textFormat);
00177 
00178     d_layoutCache = new LayoutCache;
00179 }
00180 
00182 QwtText::QwtText(const QwtText &other)
00183 {
00184     d_data = new PrivateData;
00185     *d_data = *other.d_data;
00186 
00187     d_layoutCache = new LayoutCache;
00188     *d_layoutCache = *other.d_layoutCache;
00189 }

00192 QwtText::~QwtText() 
00193 {
00194     delete d_data;
00195     delete d_layoutCache;

00199 QwtText &QwtText::operator=(const QwtText &other)
00200 {
00201     *d_data = *other.d_data;
00202     *d_layoutCache = *other.d_layoutCache;
00203     return *this;
00204 }
00205     
00206 int QwtText::operator==(const QwtText &other) const
00207 {
00208     return d_data->renderFlags == other.d_data->renderFlags &&
00209         d_data->text == other.d_data->text &&
00210         d_data->font == other.d_data->font &&
00211         d_data->color == other.d_data->color &&
00212         d_data->backgroundPen == other.d_data->backgroundPen &&
00213         d_data->backgroundBrush == other.d_data->backgroundBrush &&
00214         d_data->paintAttributes == other.d_data->paintAttributes &&
00215         d_data->textEngine == other.d_data->textEngine;
00216 }
00217 
00218 int QwtText::operator!=(const QwtText &other) const // invalidate
00219 {
00220    return !(other == *this);
00221 }

00229 void QwtText::setText(const QString &text, 
00230     QwtText::TextFormat textFormat) 
00231 {

00233     d_data->textEngine = textEngine(text, textFormat);

00256 void QwtText::setRenderFlags(int renderFlags) 
00257 { 
00258     if ( renderFlags != d_data->renderFlags )
00259     {
00260         d_data->renderFlags = renderFlags; 
00261         d_layoutCache->invalidate();
00262     }
00263 }

00300 QFont QwtText::usedFont(const QFont &defaultFont) const
00301 {
00302     if ( d_data->paintAttributes & PaintUsingTextFont )
00303         return d_data->font;
00304 
00305     return defaultFont;
00306 }

00393 void QwtText::setPaintAttribute(PaintAttribute attribute, bool on)
00394 {
00395     if ( on )
00396         d_data->paintAttributes |= attribute;
00397     else
00398         d_data->paintAttributes &= ~attribute;
00399 }

00441 
00450 int QwtText::heightForWidth(int width, const QFont &defaultFont) const
00451 {
00452     const QwtMetricsMap map = QwtPainter::metricsMap();
00453     width = map.layoutToScreenX(width);
00454 
00455 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00456     const QFont font = usedFont(defaultFont);
00457 #else
00458     // We want to calculate in screen metrics. So
00459     // we need a font that uses screen metrics
00460 
00461     const QFont font(usedFont(defaultFont), QApplication::desktop());
00462 #endif
00463 
00464     int h = 0;
00465 
00466     if ( d_data->layoutAttributes & MinimumLayout )
00467     {
00468         int left, right, top, bottom;
00469         d_data->textEngine->textMargins(font, d_data->text,
00470             left, right, top, bottom);
00471 
00472         h = d_data->textEngine->heightForWidth(
00473             font, d_data->renderFlags, d_data->text, 
00474             width + left + right);
00475 
00476         h -= top + bottom;
00477     }
00478     else
00479     {
00480         h = d_data->textEngine->heightForWidth(
00481             font, d_data->renderFlags, d_data->text, width);
00482     }
00483 
00484     h = map.screenToLayoutY(h);
00485     return h;
00486 }
00487 
00502 QSize QwtText::textSize(const QFont &defaultFont) const
00503 {
00504 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00505     const QFont font(usedFont(defaultFont));
00506 #else
00507     // We want to calculate in screen metrics. So
00508     // we need a font that uses screen metrics
00509 
00510     const QFont font(usedFont(defaultFont), QApplication::desktop());
00511 #endif
00512 
00513     if ( !d_layoutCache->textSize.isValid() 
00514         || d_layoutCache->font != font )
00515     {
00516         d_layoutCache->textSize = d_data->textEngine->textSize(
00517             font, d_data->renderFlags, d_data->text);
00518         d_layoutCache->font = font;
00519     }
00520 
00521     QSize sz = d_layoutCache->textSize;
00522 
00523     const QwtMetricsMap map = QwtPainter::metricsMap();
00524 
00525     if ( d_data->layoutAttributes & MinimumLayout )
00526     {
00527         int left, right, top, bottom;
00528         d_data->textEngine->textMargins(font, d_data->text,
00529             left, right, top, bottom);
00530         sz -= QSize(left + right, top + bottom);
00531 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00532         if ( !map.isIdentity() )
00533         {
00534 #ifdef __GNUC__
00535 #warning Too small text size, when printing in high resolution
00536 #endif
00537             /*
00538                 When printing in high resolution, the tick labels
00539                 of are cut of. We need to find out why, but for
00540                 the moment we add a couple of pixels instead.
00541              */
00542             sz += QSize(3, 0);
00543         }
00544 #endif
00545     }
00546 
00547     sz = map.screenToLayout(sz);
00548     return sz;
00549 }
00550 
00557 void QwtText::draw(QPainter *painter, const QRect &rect) const
00558 {
00559     if ( d_data->paintAttributes & PaintBackground )
00560     {
00561         if ( d_data->backgroundPen != Qt::NoPen || 
00562             d_data->backgroundBrush != Qt::NoBrush )
00563         {
00564             painter->save();
00565             painter->setPen(d_data->backgroundPen);
00566             painter->setBrush(d_data->backgroundBrush);
00567             QwtPainter::drawRect(painter, rect);
00568             painter->restore();
00569         }
00570     }
00571 
00572     painter->save();
00573 
00574     if ( d_data->paintAttributes & PaintUsingTextFont )
00575     {
00576         painter->setFont(d_data->font);
00577     }
00578 
00579     if ( d_data->paintAttributes & PaintUsingTextColor )
00580     {
00581         if ( d_data->color.isValid() )
00582             painter->setPen(d_data->color);
00583     }
00584 
00585     QRect expandedRect = rect;
00586     if ( d_data->layoutAttributes & MinimumLayout )
00587     {
00588 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00589         const QFont font(painter->font());
00590 #else
00591         // We want to calculate in screen metrics. So
00592         // we need a font that uses screen metrics
00593 
00594         const QFont font(painter->font(), QApplication::desktop());
00595 #endif
00596 
00597         int left, right, top, bottom;
00598         d_data->textEngine->textMargins(
00599             font, d_data->text,
00600             left, right, top, bottom);
00601 
00602         const QwtMetricsMap map = QwtPainter::metricsMap();
00603         left = map.screenToLayoutX(left);
00604         right = map.screenToLayoutX(right);
00605         top = map.screenToLayoutY(top);
00606         bottom = map.screenToLayoutY(bottom);
00607 
00608         expandedRect.setTop(rect.top() - top);
00609         expandedRect.setBottom(rect.bottom() + bottom);
00610         expandedRect.setLeft(rect.left() - left);
00611         expandedRect.setRight(rect.right() + right);
00612     }
00613 
00614     d_data->textEngine->draw(painter, expandedRect, 
00615         d_data->renderFlags, d_data->text);
00616 
00617     painter->restore();
00618 }
00619 
00626 const QwtTextEngine *QwtText::textEngine(const QString &text,
00627     QwtText::TextFormat format) const
00628 {
00629     static EngineDict *engineDict = NULL;
00630     if ( engineDict == NULL )
00631         engineDict = new EngineDict();
00632 
00633     return engineDict->textEngine(text, format);
00634 }
